settings.text: THE STORY BEHIND SUPER PATCH
It Began With A Personal Struggle

Super Patch’s mission is simple: to improve lives through unique, innovative, drug-free wellness solutions. The company’s origins and its journey are personal. It began over 15 years ago when Jay Dhaliwal sought alternatives to traditional medicine for his mother, who was dealing with debilitating health issues. Conventional treatments weren’t providing relief, and driven by hope, Jay researched and discovered the power of neurostimulation—the mind-to-body connection that activates our natural ability to self-heal.

This breakthrough inspired him to create Super Patch, expanding his vision to offer the world simple, effective solutions that unlock our natural potential—health, wellness, and performance—all harnessed into a wearable patch.

I'm here to build something generational
that will transform the world. 
Anything else is a waste of time.
settings.author: Jay Dhaliwal  Founder & CEO

settings.text: INNOVATING WELLNESS, ONE PATCH AT A TIME.
Super Patch is science-driven and focused on designing all-natural, drug-free solutions that increase energy, help with pain relief, better sleep, athletic performance and recovery, and more.
The company principles are simple:

settings.heading: Drug-free Wellness
settings.text: Solutions that empower people to live better by making wellness accessible, effective, and 100% natural.

settings.heading: Integrity First
settings.text: Do not make casual promises. Back up everything with clinical research.

settings.heading: Always Innovate
settings.text: Lead in neural technology. Do what no one else is doing. Be the only company of its kind in the world.

settings.heading: Make An Impact
settings.text: Help people of almost any age – from 8 years old and up – and from elite athletes to the folks who want to enjoy a walk in the park.
years in the making
In countries
Super Patches Used To Date

settings.description: And that’s what is happening. Super Patch has seen hundreds of thousands of real-life success stories and growing demand for our patches. We know we are transforming the health and wellness industry.

settings.text: A PERFORMANCE REVOLUTION, AT THE HIGHEST LEVEL.

It’s going to surprise you who already wears Super Patch to increase their physical performance, mental intensity, and focus.

Elite athletes. Dedicated strength coaches. And veteran trainers who have tried every other athletic solution for their team. They are professionals at the top of their game in the elite divisions of pro sports.
We know that underneath the uniforms of some incredible performers is Super Patch.
WHAT'S HOLDING YOU BACK?

Almost everyone has a personal wellness struggle. Every day, millions of people deal with low energy, pain or discomfort, poor sleep, and trouble focusing.

The traditional fixes like caffeine, energy drinks, over-the-counter pain meds and stimulants are short-term, plus, they can have side-effects and can contain unhealthy chemicals.
A SIMPLE, NATURAL ALTERNATIVE

Super Patch doesn’t use any drugs or chemicals. There’s nothing to be absorbed into the body and no electrical impulses either. Drug, additive, and chemical free. Made from Medical-grade 3M material. You put on a patch, and it triggers your brain and body to naturally enhance your energy, concentration, sleep cycle, recovery, and more. 13 different patches for a variety of benefits. Unlike supplements or medications, it works by activating your body’s natural potential through neural stimulation. And the best part: YOU are the generator of your own inner potential.
VIBROTACTILE TECHNOLOGY THE POWER OF TOUCH

It’s called “VTT” for short and it’s seriously complex.

Super Patch uses VTT by imprinting intricate patterns on each patch. A patch’s pattern is designed to use skin contact to send signals to your brain. The signals make the desired neuro-function work better and your body responds by performing at its best.

Think of it like “Braille For Your Brain” – the patch pattern is “read” inside of you to help you function better.

settings.text: FIND THE PATCH THAT YOU NEED

For anyone dealing with wellness issues, it’s about finding the patches that will work for you.

There are 14 different patch products, each offering a specific benefit or series of benefits. And to make it just a bit more complicated, many Super Patch products can be worn at the same time, so the benefits complement each other.

As you can see, Super Patch products can help with a wide range of health, wellness and performance issues…

REAL PEOPLE. REAL SUCCESS STORIES.

This is where the Super Patch story really shines.

Hundreds of thousands of people have already experienced the benefits of our patches. And with a steady expansion plan that includes Turkey, Switzerland, Mexico, and Colombia, for this year alone, it’s only going to get bigger. Much bigger.

And while Super Patch customer experiences are inspiring, we keep on doing the clinical research for our current line-up and for future real-world applications. With us, it’s always Integrity First, in our mission to bring Wellness to the World.
This REM Super Patch for me has been a game changer.
settings.author: Jay Glazer

settings.text: I’ve struggled with dull skin for most of my life, but now my skin glows, and everyone asks about my routine—thanks to the Lumi patch!

settings.text: Super Patch products are for anyone who wants to take their fitness and recovery game to the next level and ultimately reach their goals.

settings.text: WHY IS SUPER PATCH BETTER?
It’s almost too easy to critique the traditional health, wellness and performance solutions.
But for the sake of everyone’s well-being, it was necessary to challenge them. A health and wellness solution must help, but also, DO NO HARM.
THE SUPER PATCH ADVANTAGE

Our patches work WITH your body by using your brain and body’s natural potential for self-healing.

Traditional fixes – stimulants, pills, energy drinks – can work AGAINST the body with unhealthy, even harmful chemicals, additives and yes, too much sugar and caffeine.

settings.title: Non-Invasive
settings.description: Works with the body. Applies directly on your skin. Pattern rests on the skin surface

settings.title: Long-Lasting Benefits
settings.description:
With specific patches, the benefits can be felt in minutes.

The effects of all our patches last for 24 hours.
